alert.note: Alert for Carver; Scott; Sibley (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 11:52PM CDT until further notice by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota... Minnesota River near Jordan affecting Scott, Carver and Sibley Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Minnesota River near Jordan. * WHEN...From Monday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 29.5 feet, Highway 41 at Chaska may close when the river reaches this stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1145 PM CDT Saturday, the stage was 21.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Monday evening and continue rising to a crest of 29.8 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 29.2 feet on 06/29/2018. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
